summary: This bill, the Driver Reimbursement Increase for Veteran Equity Act of 2025 (DRIVE Act of 2025), aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to increase mileage reimbursement rates for veterans' health-related travel. It mandates that the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) mileage rate equals or exceeds the rate for government employees. Additionally, the bill stipulates that the VA must pay these allowances within 90 days of a valid request. It modifies existing sections of the code regarding payment amounts and processing times for beneficiary travel.
